configureWhatsAppIntegration: Configure WhatsApp integration for event notifications and reminders
configureTemplates: Configure WhatsApp message templates and notification settings
setupSteps: Follow these steps to configure WhatsApp notifications
setupViaContainer: WhatsApp must be configured via the container CLI. Run:
connectAccountQR: Connect your WhatsApp account by scanning the QR code
scanQRInstructions: Scan this QR code with your WhatsApp mobile app
disconnectDescription: Remove WhatsApp connection from this system
resetSessionDescription: Clear all session data and force re-authentication
chooseChat: Choose the group chat where notifications will be sent
mustAuthenticateFirst: You must authenticate WhatsApp before selecting a chat
selectChatDescription: Enter the chat ID or browse available chats
browseChatsHelp: Click to view and select from your available WhatsApp chats
enableAndTestDescription: Enable notifications and send a test message
mustSelectChatFirst: You must select a chat before enabling notifications
toggleDescription: Send automatic notifications via WhatsApp for events and reminders
notificationsDescription: Send event notifications to WhatsApp group
testDescription: Sends a test message to verify the connection
messageTemplatesDescription: Configure message templates for event notifications and reminders
languageDescription: Select the default language for WhatsApp notifications
updatesTemplateHelper: Use {{header}} for the combined title with period, {{heading}} for the title only, {{period_label}} (or {{period}}) for dates only, and {{updates}} to inject the compiled department updates text.
stakeholdersDescription: Will show a formatted list of assigned stakeholders (only appears if stakeholders are assigned to the event)
howItWorksDescription: WhatsApp notifications will be sent automatically when:
step1Description: A new event is created (if enabled in system settings)
step2Description: Event reminders are triggered based on configured schedules
step3Description: Stakeholders are notified about new tasks or updates
stepsInOrder: All steps must be completed in order
testNotificationSent: Test notification has been sent to WhatsApp
selectChatToSend: Select a chat where notifications will be sent
noChatsFound: No chats found matching your search
waitingForSession: Waiting for WhatsApp session to restore automatically
scanQRBelow: Scan the QR code below with WhatsApp mobile app
keepPageOpen: Keep this page open while we generate a new QR code
clickShowQR: Click "Show QR Code" below to connect WhatsApp
qrInstructions: Open WhatsApp on your phone → Settings → Linked Devices → Link a Device
groupDescription: WhatsApp group where notifications will be sent
toggleNotifications: Toggle WhatsApp notifications on or off
